metadata.title: USN-6100-1 -- HTML::StripScripts vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that HTML::StripScripts does not properly parse HTML content with certain style attributes. A remote attacker could use this issue to cause a regular expression denial of service (ReDoS).  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6100-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libhtml-stripscripts-perl - 1.06-1ubuntu0.18.04.1 No subscription required
